programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the detectives find a missing 14-year-old working as a prostitute, they set up a sting to put the johns away for statutory rape and find one of her customers is a former professional football player.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After auditioning for a reality show, a woman is found in Central Park unconscious, with drugs in her system and evidence of sexual assault; Detective Benson and Executive ADA Haden (Harry Connick Jr.) continue to grow closer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The investigation into a home invasion that ended with two dead leads to a shocking revelation about Detective Rollins.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: Fresh out of law school, Rudy Baylor confronts Leo F. Drummond in a medical malpractice case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Executive ADA Haden must cut their romantic weekend short to investigate the disappearance of an underage prostitute, who seems to be one in a series of escorts who went missing after advertising on a newspaper's website.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A rape investigation leads to one of Detective Benson's old cases being reopened; as Benson's work is scrutinized, her relationship with Executive ADA David Haden is put in jeopardy.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Stabler's investigation into a sexual abuse case goes awry when their wealthy suspect involves his lawyer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a pregnant 13-year-old won't identify the father of her baby, Benson and the squad try to determine if she was raped; after the investigation uncovers a secret, someone goes missing.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: Intruders break into a family's home.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: Intruders break into a family's home.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team partners with the State Department after the murder of an arms dealer is connected to a series of crimes seemingly executed by someone with elite special forces training; Callen visits ATF Agent Anna Kolcheck in prison.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Deputy Director Ochoa volunteers the team to assist with a covert operation aimed at taking down a terrorist group; Callen is concerned about what this kind of assignment may mean for the future of the team.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Robbers steal money, jewelry and highly classified information from a Navy captain's home; Deeks and Kensi interview candidates to manage the bar.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: DDA Jonah Dekker (Terrence Howard) comes to New York to defend his cousin, who has been accused of rape; ADA Casey Novak (Diane Neal) helps Detectives Stabler and Benson with the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Stabler investigate when a woman scheduled to testify in a high-profile rape case is murdered.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate a rape of an actress during a theater production.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A vigilante group forms in response to a string of rapes; concerns over his wife's fidelity distract Amaro.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Tutuola's future son-in-law becomes the latest victim in a series of hate crimes against gay men; the squad searches for a connection when a school teacher (Tony Hale) is attacked in a similar fashion.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The special victims squad tries to take down a sex-trafficking operation that enslaves young women; when the investigation is halted by Lt. Alexandra Eames (Kathryn Erbe), Detective Benson has to get creative.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a woman claims that the baby she kidnapped is hers with a respected legal expert, the investigation changes the lives of two families.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: As the detectives investigate reports of sexual abuse at an elite private school, decades of secrets are exposed.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man goes on a killing spree, but he has links to a prostitute that Benson encountered in an earlier investigation, so the FBI contacts SVU for information.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Holiday celebrations are interrupted when Detective Tutuola's ex-brother-in-law is arrested for attacking a priest; during the investigation, a church scandal is uncovered.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a janitor violently attacks a coach, the SVU team connects the janitor's behavior to a history of sexual abuse; the detectives find more victims of the same predator -- including a prisoner (Mike Tyson) on death row.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: As the SVU detectives investigate the alleged rape of a sorority pledge, drunken students and conflicting accounts complicate matters.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a concert turns into a mob scene, a teenager is brutally assaulted; Detective Amaro ends up defending the prime suspect's reputation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When two sniper attacks on the NYPD link to Detective Tutuola's past as a narcotics officer, he reconnects with his former partner in hope of finding a motive; Lt. Alexandra Eames helps SVU investigate.

programme.desc: Fresh out of law school, Rudy Baylor confronts Leo F. Drummond in a medical malpractice case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The investigation into how a comatose woman ended up in a river near the mayor's home reveals the victim's unexpected wild side.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a young boy is abandoned, the squad discovers more victims waiting to be rescued.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A vigilante group forms in response to a string of rapes; concerns over his wife's fidelity distract Amaro.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: When Asher is killed while Antonio is on his security duty, Voight and Olinsky make sure he is covered; Halstead and Lindsay go under cover; Kot wants an answer from Lindsay.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Following a big heroin bust, Olinsky learns that the suspects are holding his wife hostage; Burgess and Roman get an assignment that pairs them with a K-9 officer: Roman's former partner (Spencer Grammer).

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: The intelligence team works to find those responsible for Burgess' wounds; a search of the house provides valuable information.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Lindsay calls on Voight and his unit for help with her first case on the federal task force; Burgess is relegated to desk duty.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Ruzek's father (Jack Coleman) is first on the scene of a double murder; Lindsay prepares for an undercover investigation in Bolivia; Roman and Burgess try to move forward.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Antonio and his sister talk to Elliot Gish about the person they think is responsible for the fire that killed Shay; Lindsay has second thoughts about the task force; Platt's new, sunny demeanor results in curiosity.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Severide tries to prove his suspicions about the arsonist's identity; Casey gets accustomed to his new lifestyle; Dawson goes on a date with a regular from the bar.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Severide wants to implicate the serial arsonist; Dawson and Shay face the unexpected on a routine call; suspicions indicate Clarke is the mole; Mouch campaigns for union president.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: McLeod pushes Boden toward an early retirement and chooses a potential replacement; all make known their disdain for the mole; Shay enjoys a full social life.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Severide comes across a boy in need of help while out on a jog; Boden and McLeod clash over the future of the firehouse; Mouch and Greg Sullivan debate on Otis' podcast.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: The firehouse crew goes to the scene of a railroad accident; Boden must make a big decision about his future; Severide learns more about the woman he saw with his father; Shay and Dawson continue to butt heads.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: The shooting of a child in their neighborhood forces Cruz and his brother to think about the gang; Isabella gets Mills to dress up for a gala; Casey feels sad he will be seeing Dawson less; Shay gets in deeper with Devon.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Boden tries to keep the firehouse from closing; the romance between Dawson and Casey grows; Cruz worries for his brother's safety; Severide and Katie make up for lost time.
